All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AppDriver
This application driver code is designed to be used as a basis for the Complexity and Sorting assignment that will be developed in the CPRG304 F2025 class at SAIT.
AreaCompare
Class used to compare the areas of each ShapeObject object.
BubbleSort
Class for handling bubble sort.
Cone
Cone class that extends ShapeObject class.
Config
Contains fields and methods for configuring the program with command line arguments.
Config.CompareType
Enumerates possible values that can be used to compare objects.
Config.SortType
Enumerates possible sort types that can be used to sort objects.
Cylinder
Cylinder class that extends ShapeObject class.
HeapSort
The HeapSort gives an implementation of the Heap sort algorithm: this class makes use of the Comparator for custom sorting logic, and one that relies on the natural ordering of elements (using Comparable)
InsertionSort
Class for handling insertion sort.
MergeSort
Class to handle Merge Sorting algorithm.
OctagonalPrism
OctagonalPrism class that extends ShapeObject class.
PentagonalPrism
PentagonalPrism class that extends ShapeObject class.
Pyramid
Pyramid class that extends ShapeObject class.
QuickSort
Implements the QuickSort algorithm for sorting arrays.
SelectionSort
Class to handle Selection Sorting algorithm.
ShapeObject
ShapeObject abstract class that implements Comparable interface.
ShapeObjectManager
Class used to manage the creation of objects of class ShapeObject.
SortManager
Manages the sorting of ShapeObject arrays based on the provided configuration.
SquarePrism
SquarePrism class that extends ShapeObject class.
TriangularPrism
TriangularPrism class that extends ShapeObject class.
VolumeCompare
Class used to compare the volumes of each ShapeObject object.
